Okay, your the so called Big Bad Wolfess. However, you're not necessarily anthro nor feral, so just what are you?


Option #1 - You're a kemonomimi wolfess, meaning other than your wolf ears, tail, reflective dog-like irises, and super-canine senses, you look and seem wholly human.

122.content:
Today is your birthday and you felt like taking a stroll through the woods. You tell your mother this and she tells you to come back soon for cake and ice cream. Just before leaving, you grab your favorite red cloak and put your hood on and you began your walk into the woods.

The birds were chirping as you walked down the little path to a river that led to a small lake, the smell of spring time flowers wafted into your nose. As you walked, you could've sworn you heard something in the bushes nearby.

"Hello?" you asked, expecting an answer from the bushes.

You recieve your answer to your question, but not in the way you expected as a tall grey-furred wolf walked into the open. She stood taller than you by a head or two and was naked, her ample breasts and womanly privates shown to all prying eyes. She looks at you with her golden eyes, a look on her face that tells you her intentions.

"Hello, human," the she-wolf spoke in a sultry voice. "What brings you to wonder this deep into my neck of the woods?"

You didn't reply immediatly, still looking over the she-wolfs body. She was toned and muscled, signs of her being very strong and yet still feminine. She looked almost like an amazon covered in grey fur, the only thing missing is a spear in her hands.

Then she removes the hood from your head and looks at you deep in the eyes, her gaze with her golden eyes almost piercing into your very soul.

"Answer me," she says. "Why are you here in my territory with naught but the cloth you wear?"

You feel like your heart is in your throat, hearing her voice intimidating you and her eyes looking at yours. You tell her your answer.

"T-today is my birthday."

"Really now?" she asks. "Follow me then and I shall give my present to you, red-hood."

Against your better judgement, you follow the she-wolf down the path. You then see her grab a stick with a sharp stone wrapped around the top from behind a tree. She really is an amazon, you thought.

You soon arrived at the lake, the she-wolf stabbed the ground with her spear and turned to look at you with her golden eyes.

"I'm called Hazel, daughter of Lupa and Beo of the Grey Wolf Tribe. Or what remains of it. What do your people call you, red-hood?"

"My name is Red," you tell her, worried and unsure why she asks you for your name or why she brought you to this lake.

"Red, huh?" she says. "I've heard worse names humans call their kin. How old are you, Red?"

"I've just turned 18, Miss Hazel," you tell her, still uneased by your current situation.

"18," she repeats. "You have reached the age of maturity. It is a custom of my people to put any that reach that age through a test, a ritual to prove themselves worthy enough to be accepted as an adult."

"What kind of ritual?" you ask her with worry in your voice.
122.title: Into the Woods

1221.content:
“A sacred ritual that has been passed down for generations in my tribe,” Hazel intones ominously before stepping closer. One paw, which sort of reminds you of a hand, cups your shoulder while the other pinches your chin, turning your head this way and that, her hard yellow eyes assessing you. You're suddenly nervous, realizing you're very close to a very naked woman—er, wolf?—and she's touching you.
“You will do, I suppose,” she says scathingly and you start to bristle. She taps your cheek with a single claw. “Ah, ah, little human, don't lose your temper,” she purrs, smiling to show long, sharp teeth.
You shiver as she abruptly drops to her knees and unbuttons your pants. You squawk in surprise—after all, relations of this type are between couples and you've never been touched by anyone else—as she slices past your underwear with a quick slash of her claws. Your cock's harder than it's ever been, standing out towards her pouty lips, and she takes your cock in her hand. She starts to jerk you off and you nearly drop to the ground; it's like heat washing over you, especially in your crotch, and you start to rock your hips against her paw.
Moans and low curses fall out of you as she jerks your off expertly, her smile devilish and yellow eyes flaming with desire, a hand alternating between her hard nipples and her little clit.
1221.title: "A Mating Ritual." (Sexual Content)

choices: To Meet Up With Her Lover
To Meet Up With Your Mother
To Meet Up With Your Grandmother
1222.content:
"A Ritual of Trust, Red," Hazel replied. "When we reach 18, the wolf must go through a test of trust, a trust sacred among my people. It is a custom that the males willingly allow the females to devour them whole and alive and vice versa with the females allowing the males to devour."

Hearing that they eat each other whole and alive causes you to sweat nervously. The wolfess sees you getting afraid, understanding your human reaction.

"As I said, it is a Ritual of Trust. There's nothing more testing of one's trust than willingly allow a predator to consume your entire being and contain you within their body. If they do not panic or struggle during the ritual, they will pass and be welcomed into pack with open arms. But if they do panic or struggle, they will fail the ritual and become one with their predator. Even when the predator sleeps when they squirm, the stomach will recognize them as prey and digest them."

You nervously gulp, hearing that they'll digest the wolf if they fail this "Trust Test," even when they're asleep. Her explanation made you very scared. Hazel notices this.

"You're afraid," she tells you. "I understand. I was very afraid when Beo, my father, took me into his stomach. I was scared beyond anything, but I knew that I would become one with my dad if I allow my fear to cosume me. I steeled myself and held my resolve until I passed through his body and was "reborn" to the tribe. It was then, when I felt the wind touch my fur after a day inside my father, that I became a true member of the tribe."

"A-A-A-A-An entire day?!" you say, scared a touch more now.

"To truly test a pups trust, they must spend a whole day inside their predator's stomach. If they fail, they become one with their predator and life would continue as normal. The parents would mourn briefly for their loss, but would move on and forget about their loss. Now then, strip yourself naked and prepare for the ritual."

You almost jumped out of your own skin, hearing her talk about all that nonchalantly and expect you to go with it. You were thinking about just making a break for it and run for your life, but you knew Hazel is probably a skilled hunter and she has her spear. All you have is the clothes you're wearing, your red cloak, a small dagger, and your wit.

"Well? I'm waiting, Red."

Hazel seemed so calm to talk about a life or death situation like it was normal. You admit she is rather attractive for a wolf, but you were still scared about failing this test and dying in her stomach. You weigh your options carefully and decided that the best course of action...is to proceed with the ritual.

You remove your red cloak and hanged it on a treebranch, then you removed your dagger and set it below your hood. You then proceeded to remove your clothes and neatly folded them as best as you can and setting them down next to your dagger, now naked and somewhat freezing from the cold. Hazel stood up to her full height, completely towering over you, and looked into your eyes as she idly licks her chops.

"Red, are you prepared to put your very life at risk for the sake of trust?" she spoke.

"Y-Yes," you answered.

"Are you prepared to spend an entire day inside my body?"

"Yes."

"Are you prepared to become one with my body, should your resolve falter and your trust broken?"

You hesitated, but answered.

"...Yes."

"Very well. I, Hazel, daughter of Lupa and Beo of the Grey Wolf Tribe, accept you as my prey and shall consume you whole. May the spirits be with you, son of man."

Her speech done, Hazel opens her maw wider than any normal person would and proceeds to eat you alive. Your head was in her throat already and soon the rest you will follow suit. The wolfess didn't waste time tasting you and quickly gulped you down, your entire being now resting inside her now pregnant-looking belly.

Hazel rubs her gut and gives it a few pats, feeling you moving inside her. Your movements were not of panic as you tried to make yourself more comfortable inside the tight confines of Hazel's stomach. Suddenly, she let loose a loud and unlady-like belch.

"BWAAAARRRRRRPPP!!! Whoo! 'Scuse me," she said. She pokes her belly a few times. "You okay in there, Red?"

"I'm okay, considering I'm inside a wolf's stomach," you replied.

"Good, I'm glad. I've somewhere to go, Red. I'll return to this spot before the ritual is over."

Hopefully it won't be to dispose of my remains, you thought to yourself.

-----

Where does Hazel go?
1222.title: Ritual of Trust

choices: A Day Passes With No Problems
12223.content:
You felt the stomach containing you bouncing around, Hazel walking to wherever she needs to be. All you could do was occasionally move to get yourself more comfortable, finding your current "home" to be surprisingly breatheable despite the wolfess' burp earlier. The warm liquid around your feet was merely harmless liquid.

She's been true to her word so far, you thought to yourself. You also wondered curiously where she was going.

Outside, Hazel walked through the woods effortlessly with you in her belly, proud of her strength. She walked through bush after bush until she saw her destination, a small cabin with one lone resident. The wolfess walked to the door and knocked on the door, awaiting a reply.

"Who's there?" a woman's voice said inside.

"It's me, Hazel," she replied.

"Door's open," answered the voice.

Hazel opens the door and walks inside, closing the door behind her as she approached the woman. She was a human that stood a little shorter than Hazel, dressed in a worn blue dress, with silver grey hair that reached the middle of her back. She turned her head to reveal a woman that looks years younger than she actually is, her blue eyes looking at the wolfess hunter.

"Hazel, dear," she said, her arms open as she expects a hug.

"Lady Blue," the wolfess replied, accepting the hug with slight difficulty with you in the stomach. After the hug, the woman known as "Lady Blue" steps back to see Hazel's big gut.

"Caught a big one today, Hazel?" she asks the wolfess.

"Not a meal, really," Hazel says. "I found a human pup that has become of age. He's currently going through the ritual right now."

"You mean your "Trust Test" ritual? Honestly, dear, not every creature on this earth follows the same rules as your tribe does, you know."

"I'm well aware, Lady Blue. However, I feel it is necessary to do so, regardless of species."

"Yes, yes. Next time you do so, at least bring them here for me to see their cute faces. So, who's in there? You got the name before eating, right?"

"Of course, I did. He calls himself "Red.""

This causes the woman to gasp suddenly, hearing your name as the boy in Hazel's stomach.

"Red?! You mean my grandson?! You ate my grandson?!"

"You know him??"

"Yes, I do! He comes over every once in a while to visit me! Spit him out!"

"I cannot, as it is against the ritual's-"

"I don't care about that! That's my grandson! Poor thing could die in there!"

"Lady Blue! If your grandson dies, then he has failed the ritual and he'll become a part of me. But of he lives, he'll have passed and be birthed as a man."

"..."

Inside, you heard it all, although it was muffled due to being in a predator's belly. You couldn't believe it. Hazel know your grandmother, Lady Blue!

"Grandma, is that really you?!" you call out.

"Yes, it's me, Red! Are you alright?" she answers.

"I'm okay, grandma! Do you still look forty years old?"

"I do. It's all thanks to being a witch. That and, well, dieting. Anyway, don't worry! I'll get you out of there!"

"Wait, grandma! Wait! Don't!" you told her.

Lady Blue stops what she was gonna do and listens to what you have to say.

"Look, I chose to go through with this. Please, let me finish this. I can do this. Trust me."

Your grandmother then places a hand on Hazel's stomach.

"...Do me proud, Red. If you make it..."

"And I will, grandma!"

"...I promise to make it worth your while. And Hazel will have no choice but join. Okay?"

"Okay!"

And thus, the ritual continues.

-----

What happens now?
12223.title: Quite the Surprise, eh?

122232.content:
Your witch grandmother, Lady Blue, talks with Hazel a bit about other things, trying to get her mind off you being inside the wolfess' stomach. You didn't listen to the conversation as you decided to sleep, thinking that this would speed up the process for you. As you slept away, the day outside went fast and soon became night.

"Please spend the night here, Hazel," Lady Blue asks the wolfess. "If Red were to be digested sometime during the night, I want to be the first to know and then tell my daughter of his fate."

The wolfess thought it over for a few seconds before speaking her answer.

"Very well. I sleep here for the night."

The two women opted to share the bed so that your witch grandma could feel you as she sleeps. The two slept soundly for the first few hours, but the door suddenly opened slowly. A figure walked in and proceeded to the bedroom, finding two people sleeping in the bed.

The figure then started to nudge Lady Blue awake. The witch woke up to see the face of her daughter, your mother.

"Goldie?" she whispered.

"Mother, I need your help!" your mother whispered. "My son, Red, hasn't come back home! I'm worried!"

As Blue got out of bed to comfort her daughter, the wolfess you were sleeping inside of rolled over in her sleep and exposed her gut that contained your sleeping form. Your mother sees Hazel and grew more scared, especially after seeing the gut move a little.

"Is...Is this your...sex partner? Is she...epecting?" your mother thoped it was the cause.

Blue knew her daughter was talking about Hazel. She pondered what to say to Goldie, concluding that she won't lie to your mother. With a deep breath, she told her daughter...

"Little Red is...going through a ritual."

"What...kind of ritual, mom?" Goldie asked quietly.

"A trust ritual. My grandson is in the belly of that wolf woman."

As soon as she heard you were inside Hazel's stomach, Goldie opted to scream but was quickly silenced by Blue's hand over her mouth.

"Listen, my dear. Your son willingly chose to go through with it. He's done well so far. All he needs to do is last through the night and he'll be back into your arms. However, there's still a small chance he'll fail. If he doesn't pass, he'll become wolf pudge."

Goldie tries to remove the hand from her mouth, but couldn't overpower her own mother.

145.content:
(Authors note: in this world, nudity is not taboo, it's the norm, humans imitate the other predator races in this regard, hoping to be accepted)

Looking up a thing the brick building, Luna (the wolfess) walked toward the door, the nice breeze caressing her fur doing little to remove the butterflies in her stomach. She was looking to adopt. Not just to make a kids dream come true, but because she found out she was barren, unfertile, however you wanted to say it, she couldn't have pups. But that's where the orphanage came in handy.

Opening the door, the naked anthro wolf walked in and rang the bell at the desk, an anthro fox coming up to the desk.

"Yes ma'am?" He asked, "How can I help you?"

Luna swallowed her nervousness before answering, "I'm looking to adopt."

The tod nodded to the side, "Right through there, it's an off-day, so everybody should be in there."

Nodding, Luna walked in the room, looking at all the various species of children, foxes, wolves, lions, and a human. Looking at him, she saw that he was all alone in the corner by himself, a small red hooded cape on his shoulders, a GI Wolf and Commando in his hands. Poor guy, just because humans were the weakest of predators meant they were often looked down upon, legally they were equals, but no so much in social interaction.

Walking over to him she sat down opposite of him, "Hi there."

He looked up at her, his brown hair cut short and neat, green eyes wide with nervousness. "Hi." He whispered.

Smiling, she continued, "What're you playing?"

He shrugged, "I 'unno. Jus' playin'."

"Nobody wants to play with you?"

He shook his head, "Imma human, nobody likes me." He gestured to his body, "No fur," pointing to his bare behind, "no tail," he pulled his hood back to show his round human ears, "and stupid little ears." Plopping back down, he pulled his too small cape closer to his body, "Imma be an orphan forever."

Luna couldn't take it anymore, she got up and walked back to the desk, the tod still there waiting for her.

"Make a descision?" He asked.

"I'll adopt the human boy." She said firmly.

The tods eyebrows shot up, "Really? You want Red?" At Luna's face he quickly added, "No preds adopt humans, at least, not around here."

"I just can't let the little guy be sad and alone," she rubbed her hands together, "it's not right."

He simply raised his hand, "I understand, I'll get the papers ready. You can take him home tomorrow if everything checks out."

Smiling, Luna began to eagerly fill out the papers.

info.brief_description: What if the big bad wolf was female?
info.description:
This is Second Person P.O.V.

Okay, so we all heard the nursery rhyme about Little Red Riding Hood and the Big Bad Wolf. But what if the story had a female wolf instead of a male wolf? How would things turn out? Would the wolfess still swallow the little hooded human like her alternate self of the opposite gender? Might she get a little seductive and pleasure both of them? Might her maternal instincts kick in to protect the little hooded human? Might she even hold a secret hidden from the child? This will have both child and teen storylines.

A surprise storyline is added.

Rules for the story: (Changes have been made)
1. No death of the mane characters, mainly Red Riding Hood and The Big Bad Wolfess, oh, and the Grandma. Deaths of minor characters are okay, but do not go into detail or description on how they die.
2. Nothing gory or graphic.
3. An anthro version of the Big Bad Wolfess is allowed, whether she remains bare naked with fur or wears clothing is up to you.
4. This story may contain oral vore or unbirth. (no other vore is allowed.)
5. Sex is allowed for the story, but don't go too in depth about it.
6. Little Red can either be male or female.
7. Little Red can become the Big Bad Wolfess' pup. (if unbirthed, or through magic or a potion, or something of that nature, bitten, if werewolf is your thing.)
8. Little Red can also become the Big Bad Wolfess' slave, mate or still be food, depending on what you choose to happen.
9. Breastfeeding is allowed.
10. I will allow Little Red to be babied for age regression fetish viewers if Red Riding Hood becomes the Big Bad Wolfess' pup.
11. The hunters will not be in this story. The Grandma can be included, but the main focus is Red Riding Hood and the Wolfess.
12. No diapers in this story and that includes any age regression additions. (Previous additions made it to uncomfortable for me to allow it now.)
11. I will allow a lesbian relationship, but no male x male, since the wolf is female. There will be no gender change of the The Big Bad Wolfess. She stays female. (chapters that violate this rule will be deleted.)
12. Gender change of Little Red is allowed if he or she undergoes becoming a wolf.
13. No short chapters like, "The wolfess followed Little Red Riding hood, and.....", and then stopping it there. (This will be deleted.)

If there are options I have not listed or things that you may have questions on, email me on site and I will answer your questions. Rules may change as story progresses. Hope you enjoy reading and writing the story. Have fun. Please add to this interactive story. Help me to get at least 60 chapters.
